TopicTitle: KSP 1.0: How To Build Space Stations And Docking.

Articles.Content:
In this tutorial I show you how I build and construct space stations and how you can do the Station Contracts in KSP 1.0. This video also covers how to Dock with other vessels.

Now in reality there is no right way to do this. The only tricky part to station building is the docking if you have multiple parts to the station to attach.

So this video is more of a How I build my space stations and some tips and tricks to make life a little more easy for you.

Good luck my friends.
